overview: Nobody celebrates the Easter Season quite like Wubbzy and his freinds! In these 6 egg-ceptional episodes, Wubbzy discovers new ways to decorate eggs for the Easter Egg Hunt, celebrates the first day of Spring with his kickity-kick ball and has to save the holiday when Easter is cancelled!
tagline: Wow Wow Wubbzy is celebrating the most eEgg-cellent Easter ever
title: Wubbzy's Egg-Cellent Easter
